item.title: Twitter Circles: Top 150 friends
item.description:
Twitter is testing a new feature called Twitter Circles where you can restrict the reach of your tweets to up to 150 people. I remember the days of MySpace where many relationships were made / broken as a result of being in someone's Top 8 Friends list ðŸ˜†
